Articles.Content: I\'ve just uptaded from 0.15 and I\'m using my original crafts from earlier version but it seems that from 0.15 to o.15.2 my craft doesn\'t get as far with the same fuel/engines/boosters. Has something changed in the lastest update?
AFAIK, nothing was changed in terms of boosters and such. I believe they fixed a few bugs, but nothing more.
